**Chi-Kuang Yeh**\
*Department of Mathematics and Statistics*\
*Georgia State University*

## Description

This is the Personal website for Chi-Kuang Yeh, powered by Hugo's Avicenna Theme.

I am currently an Assistant Professor in Statistics at Georgia State University. My research interests include statistical learning, high-dimensional data analysis, optimal design of experiment, and applications in genomics, bioinformatics, neuroscience and beyond. I am passionate about developing novel statistical methods to address complex data challenges in the era of big data.
